"Grace's Quest: The Journey to Freedom"

Greetings, my loyal subjects. As you know, I am Queen Grace, and I take great pride in my knowledge and intellect. However, I am also known for my fairness and justice, and I believe that everyone deserves a chance to prove themselves. That is why I have created a puzzle game that will test your knowledge of me and offer you a chance to earn your freedom. You will have to answer 10 questions about me based on 3 hints and with only 3 attempts for each question. If you answer all the questions correctly, I will grant you your freedom, and you will be free to live your life as you please.You will have to use your problem-solving skills to decipher the hints and answer the questions correctly. With each correct answer, you will move closer to your goal of freedom. But with every incorrect answer, you will be one step closer to a life of eternal servitude.
